body_html: @klappradla the new Google account for RGSoC has been set up, what would be the next steps? do I have to create a new API key linked to that account, add our Foundation CC info, and update the environment variables? That's one of the few items left on the checklist to consolidate access to accounts: rails-girls-summer-of-code/organization#179

body: @klappradla the new Google account for RGSoC has been set up, what would be the next steps? do I have to create a new API key linked to that account, add our Foundation CC info, and update the environment variables? That's one of the few items left on the checklist to consolidate access to accounts: https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/organization/issues/179
